title: Describe how human activity influences geomorphological processes? - Quora

response.answer_text: Industrial activities which causes acid rain and alter weathering Mining on slopes causing slope instability. Agricultural activities like deforestation which exposes rocks and slopes to weathering agents Tourism in caves Concrete surfaces along slopes increase overlandflow Slope undercutting to build roads and bridges
This topic geomorphological process is nicely laid out and can be done with computer search.
